questions.question: Sam enjoys riding my bicycle. Sometimes I lend .................... to ................
questions.description: Use the object form of the pronoun after a preposition.

questions.question: This is my uncle ................... lives in the US.
questions.description: That cannot be used to refer to people in non-identifying relative clauses.

questions.question: If we ask ...................., she will show .................... how to solve the problem.
Here is the passenger ....................... bag was lost.
This is the movie ....................... won the award.
questions.description: Which is used to refer to things.

questions.question: Jaipur, ...................... is called the pink city, is the capital of Rajasthan.
questions.description: That cannot be used in non-identifying relative clauses.

questions.question: The dog hurt ......................
questions.description: We use reflexive pronouns when the subject and object refer to the same person or thing.

questions.question: I ..................... went to the mall and bought it.
They have visited our home a few times but we have never been to ………………….
questions.description: Theirs is a possessive pronoun their is a possessive adjective it is used before a noun.

questions.question: That cat of ………………….. has drunk my milk.
